title: RP for a drawing?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hi Riot,I heard you can get some free RP for a drawing, I would really like 41 RP to spend on your game! :)
Here's a link to a drawing I did. thanks.

replies.body:
That heckin' Blitzcrank laugh haunts my dreams xD!

Be sure to check your RP total next time you login ;)
The Sad part is that I don't think they are doing RP for drawing anymore.
